name: HKP-Notebook
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; echo "==> Auto-sourcing GHCup"; for rc in "$HOME/.bashrc" "$HOME/.zshrc"; do touch "$rc"; grep -qxF "test -f \"$HOME/.ghcup/env\" && source \"$HOME/.ghcup/env\"" "$rc" || echo "test -f \"$HOME/.ghcup/env\" && source \"$HOME/.ghcup/env\"" >> "$rc"; done; if [ ! -x "$HOME/.ghcup/bin/ghcup" ]; then echo "==> Installing GHCup"; curl --proto "=https" --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://get-ghcup.haskell.org | BOOTSTRAP_HASKELL_NONINTERACTIVE=1 BOOTSTRAP_HASKELL_INSTALL_NO_STACK=1 sh; else echo "==> GHCup already installed"; fi; test -f "$HOME/.ghcup/env" && source "$HOME/.ghcup/env"; export PATH="$HOME/.ghcup/bin:$PATH"; echo "==> Ensuring GHC + Cabal"; ghcup install ghc recommended || true; ghcup set ghc recommended; ghcup install cabal recommended || true; ghcup set cabal recommended; echo "==> Done"'
